name: Booster Pack for Gutenberg
author: WebTechStreet

sections.description:
This plugin add new blocks to Gutenberg Editor.

It adds following blocks to Gutenberg
* Advanced Divider – It allow you to add Divider with text.
* Dual Heading – Add Dual Color heading. Heading can be split in two parts and each part can be colored separately.
* Progress Bar – Add Multicolor, Animated Progress bar blocks.

Many more blocks coming soon…
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Initial launch.
  • Added Blocks – Advanced Divider, Dual Heading & Progress Bar
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
